languages.text:
After its cogener's death, this creature can make +2 additional attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50%. All attacks can stun the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text:
После смерти собрата это существо может совершать 2 дополнительные атаки за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и получает:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очка передвижения{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}</indent>
Весь получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} уменьшается на 50%. Все атаки могут могут оглушить цель на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
After its cogener's death, this creature can make +2 additional attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}</indent>

All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50%. All attacks can stun the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50%. All attacks can stun the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
После смерти собрата это существо может совершать 2 дополнительные атаки за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и получает:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очка передвижения{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}</indent>
Весь получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} уменьшается на 50%. Все атаки могут могут оглушить цель на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text:
After its cogener's death, this creature can make +2 additional attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50%. All attacks can stun the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
その同属の死後、この生物は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}につき追加で2回攻撃でき、以下を得る：
<indent=5%>+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}を+30</indent>
すべての被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が-50%軽減される。すべての攻撃がターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間スタンさせることができる。
languages.original_text:
After its cogener's death, this creature can make +2 additional attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50%. All attacks can stun the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
その同属の死後、この生物は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}につき追加で2回攻撃でき、以下を得る：
<indent=5%>+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}を+30</indent>
すべての被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が-50%軽減される。すべての攻撃がターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間スタンさせることができる。

languages.text:
当此生物的同类死亡时，此生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可以额外进行2次攻击，并获得以下效果：
<indent=5%>+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。</indent>
<indent=5%>+30{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。</indent>
承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%，所有攻击都可以使目标眩晕一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text:
After its cogener's death, this creature can make +2 additional attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50%. All attacks can stun the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
当此生物的同类死亡时，此生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可以额外进行2次攻击，并获得以下效果：
<indent=5%>+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。</indent>
<indent=5%>+30{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。</indent>
承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%，所有攻击都可以使目标眩晕一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text:
Tras la muerte de su congénere, esta criatura puede lanzar +2 ataques adicionales por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y gana:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} , y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}</indent>
El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que recibe se reduce un −50 %. Todos los ataques pueden aturdir al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text:
After its cogener's death, this creature can make +2 additional attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50%. All attacks can stun the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Tras la muerte de su congénere, esta criatura puede lanzar +2 ataques adicionales por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y gana:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} , y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}</indent>
El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que recibe se reduce un −50 %. Todos los ataques pueden aturdir al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
Nach dem Tod ihres Artgenossen kann diese Kreatur +2 weitere Angriffe pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} ausführen und erhält:<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}</indent>
Erlittener {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird um -50 % reduziert. Alle Angriffe können das Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang betäuben.
languages.original_text:
After its cogener's death, this creature can make +2 additional attacks per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −50%. All attacks can stun the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Nach dem Tod ihres Artgenossen kann diese Kreatur 2 zusätzliche Angriffe pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} ausführen und erhält:
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}</indent>
Jeglicher eingehender Schaden wird um -50 % reduziert. Alle Angriffe können das Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang betäuben.

Nach dem Tod ihres Artgenossen kann diese Kreatur +2 weitere Angriffe pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} ausführen und erhält:<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}</indent>
Erlittener {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird um -50 % reduziert. Alle Angriffe können das Ziel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang betäuben.

languages.text:
Après la mort de son congénère, cette créature peut lancer 2 attaques supplémentaires par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et bénéficie de :
<indent=5%>+4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>+30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis sont réduits de -50 %. Toutes les attaques peuvent étourdir la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
